item.description:
Want less stress and more joy this holiday? Want to laugh and savor chocolate and get the endorphins flowing?

If so, try our Laughter Club! Many people say it is a life-changing, exhilarating experience. Meet other laughter-loving folks!

We use laughter as exercise, and we play simple games and do deep breathing techniques. Participating is fun and easy! People of all physical abilities and ages are welcome. No special flexibility required.

We'll be enjoying Aruna Chocolates, which are organic, raw, and made with no refined sugar. Super delicious and good for you!

Schedule:

6:00 pm -7:00 pm: Laughing
7:15 pm – 9:00 pm: Healthy, Happy Potluck.

More info about the potluck: http://www.meetup.com/high-vibe-tribe/events/92848972/

CLOTHING/WATER: Water bottle and comfortable clothing and shoes are recommended.No yoga mats.

COST: Donations requested to cover Meetup costs and other publicity efforts. $1 - $10. No one turned away due to a lack of funds. No pressure to donate.

Free parking in the back of the ArtSpace building. The entrance to the parking lot is between the 84 ramp and the ArtSpace building at 555 Asylum. Ignore the “Resident Parking Only" sign.

INSTRUCTOR: Laura Le, certified Laughter Yoga instructor (http://www.ctlaugh.com)
item.name: Chocolate Laughter Party! (Formerly called "Laugh Away Holiday Stress")
